about_the_game:
Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are accidentally unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse.
Your path will take you and your Egyptians through different landscapes, which must be made walkable with great effort and various buildings and monuments needs to be built upon.
Use tricks, defeat countless creatures and lose no time to banish the dark forces again and lift the curse!

- Popular click management game with many challenging and exciting levels
- Adventures of cuddly Egyptians in different landscapes
- Awards and trophies
- Mode without time limit for a relaxed gaming experience
- Challenging, entertaining game play


This is a collector's edition full of extras not included in the standard version.
The collector's edition includes:

- 10 bonus levels for even more adventure
- Find hidden ankhs in each level and collect stickers
- Beautiful downloadable wallpapers
- Insights into the making of the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard

short_description: Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse. Your path will take you and your Egyptians through different landscapes. Defeat countless creatures and lose no time to lift the curse!
